creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: wide red vase with blue fish design holding white, pink, orange, and yellow roses; gray background
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seal

Japanese inscription L margin
medium: Woodblock print; ink and colors on paper
signed: signed in pencil, bottom R: [Fujio Yoshida]; printed signature LRC of image; printed title LL margin: [Roses]
title: Roses
